title: 为什么我的MC玩不了？难道是显卡不支持MC？，显卡问题还是什么问题导致的?
author: HTB小人
txt_content:
我用的是刚下的MC整合包，显卡是MX4000.下面是错误报告。

 Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game

A full error report has been saved to D:\Minecraft1.5.1-MAJIANG-v2.0\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-06-10_13.39.18-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

错误报告可能我是不是显卡问题，不支持MC及其他问题，求解答。

replies.author: eruw111
replies.txt_content: 显卡应该没问题，你试试更新java

replies.author: HTB小人
replies.txt_content:
eruw111 发表于 2013-6-10 14:39 
显卡应该没问题，你试试更新java
我已经下过了.....

replies.author: 小阳光
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 小阳光 于 2013-6-10 15:27 编辑 

您下载的是整合包还是原版呢?
崩溃的原因很多种的,你下载的MC地址能发下嘛?这是最新mc基础整合包http://tieba.baidu.com/p/2303978955
没有额外的MOD的,不会引起崩溃 你可以试下
[size=13.63636302947998px]1.Forge 7.8.0.684
[size=13.63636302947998px]2.OptiFine_1.5.2_HD_U_D2_CN (高清修复)
[size=13.63636302947998px]3.TooManyItems2013_04_25_1.5.2_CN (TMI内置修改器)
[size=13.63636302947998px]4.ReiMinimap_v3.3_05_CN (小地图)
[size=13.63636302947998px]5.CraftGuide-1.6.7 (G键合成表)
[size=13.63636302947998px]6.InventoryTweaks-1.54_CN (R键整理背包)
[size=13.63636302947998px]7.InputFix 支持搜索物品中文输入

replies.author: hukk
replies.txt_content:
HTB小人 发表于 2013-6-10 16:24 
经测试，MC全部不能启动。
新手尽量不要下这种整合包，容易混淆

replies.author: 渊源丿
replies.txt_content: 下载JAVA的最新版本，应该有用。
